sentences.en: A system of optic - electric implementation based on structured light is presented.
sentences.cn: 提出一种基于结构光的光电混合系统.

sentences.en: But with fiber - optic cables, television will become truly interactive.
sentences.cn: 但是,有了光纤电缆, 电视就可以真正成为交互式的.

sentences.en: Conclusion FFA is and effective diagnostic measure for diabetic optic neuropathy.
sentences.cn: 结论FFA是诊断糖尿病视神经病变的有效方法之一.

sentences.en: Crystals of this type , having only one optic axis, are called uniaxial crystals.
sentences.cn: 这种只有一根光轴的晶体称为单轴晶体.

sentences.en: Fibre optic is the only medium that ideally fulfils future requirements.
sentences.cn: 楼层布线是静态的,需要花很大功夫才能修改.

sentences.en: I use Physical Optic method and compare the result with exact solution.
sentences.cn: 我用物理光学方法和比较的结果与精确解.

sentences.en: Ischemic optic neuropathy was present in 0.006 % of patients.
sentences.cn: 006%的病人出现缺血性视神经病变.

sentences.en: Measurements included cycloplegic refraction , biometric axial length and optic disc stereo - photographs.
sentences.cn: 测量其屈光度 、 眼轴长及视神经之立体相片.

sentences.en: Mullon KT . Color and luminance vision in human optic neuritis � � J ］ . Brain 1986 ; 109∶1 - 13 .
sentences.cn: [6]黄时洲, 吴德正,吴乐正.视神经炎和慢性开角型青光眼患者的色觉[]眼科学报1991; 7∶2-94.

sentences.en: Progress of optical phased array ( OPA ) technology based on electro - optic material is summarized.
sentences.cn: 综述了基于电光材料的光学相控阵 ( OPA ) 的研究进展.

sentences.en: Retinal hemorrhage, and blurring of the optic dise cause visual disturbances.
sentences.cn: 视网膜出血及神经盘模糊等可导致视力障碍.

sentences.en: The large intensity of scattering reveals the large nonlinear optic character.
sentences.cn: 拉曼光谱大的散射强度说明晶体有大的非线性光学特性.

sentences.en: The reason for this is that the optic nerve is a part of the brain.
sentences.cn: 这其中的原因在于视神经是大脑的一部分。

sentences.en: We first take up the subject of optic ray propagation through a variety of optical media.
sentences.cn: 首先研究光束通过各种光学介质的传播问题.

sentences.en: What are two advantages of using fiber - optic cabling instead of UTP?
sentences.cn: 使用光纤打海底电报而不是UTP的二个利益是 什么 ?
